Reference

All functions

By()

Apply a Function to a Data Frame Split by Factors

Col()

Combine()

Extract graph

IC()

Extract i.i.d. decomposition (influence function) from model object

Extract model

Define range constraints of parameters

backdoor()

baptize()

cancel()

`covariance<-`(<lvm>)

Identify candidates of equivalent models
